rule: Prohibition of Hate Speech and Discrimination
description: The rule against hate speech and discrimination strictly forbids any use of language that incites violence or promotes discrimination against individuals or groups based on their race, ethnicity, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, or other protected characteristics.

rule: No Posting of Sexually Explicit Content
description: Posting explicit nudity or pornography is not allowed.
Sharing personal information about others, such as addresses, phone numbers, social security numbers, or other private details, without their consent is prohibited.
Engaging in scams, phishing attempts, or deceptive advertising is strictly prohibited.
Engaging in cyberbullying or targeted harassment is strictly forbidden.
Promoting or glorifying illegal activities, such as drug use or terrorism, is not allowed.

rule: No Unauthorized Posting of Copyrighted Material
description: Posting copyrighted material without obtaining the necessary permissions is not permitted.

rule: Prohibition of Graphic Violence or Gore
description: Posting content that contains graphic violence or gore is prohibited.

rule: Preventing the Spread of False or Misleading Information
description: Posting false or misleading information about public health or safety is not allowed.

rule: Prohibition of Encouraging Self-Harm or Suicide
description: Encouraging self-harm or suicide in any form is strictly prohibited.
